area_comments: As per the sale deed and house plan permission, built-up area on ground floor is 1,050 sft and first floor is 1,050 sft, totaling 2,100 sft. Planned area as per permission is 1,496 sft; actual constructed is higher, resulting in deviation.
occupancy_comments: Based on municipal tax and utility bills in the owner's name and property photos, the property is self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: Property is fully constructed and occupied as per site photographs and municipal records.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, house plan permission, municipal tax receipt, utility bill, valuation initiation form.
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located in Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District, Telangana.
• As per the sale deed and house plan, the land area is 134 sq. yds (1,206 sft) and the total built-up area is 2,100 sft (ground floor 1,050 sft + first floor 1,050 sft).
• The property is constructed on Plot No. 177, Survey No. 277, Ameenpur Village & G.P., Ameenpur Mandal, Sangareddy District, Telangana.
• The subject property is self-occupied as validated by municipal tax receipts and utility bills in the owner's name.
• The property is part of Green Villas and is surrounded by other residential houses in a well-developed residential locality.
• The property is fully constructed and in good condition as of the date of inspection.
• Room count as per blueprint and photos: 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 halls, 2 kitchens, 2 other rooms.
• There is a deviation in built-up area between planned and actual construction as per documents.
• No negative areas observed in the immediate surroundings; condition is good.
• No evidence of protected/regulated area status.
• For the purpose of this value assessment, it is assumed that the subject property has a clear title and all necessary approvals and permissions have been duly obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 22 July 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 22 July 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
